original_title: Le royaume nain de Lilliput contre Gigas le long, prince des géants
overview: In the dwarf kingdom of Lilliput, people were celebrating the engagement of the Princess Piccolina. Meanwhile, the rumor eventually reached the ears of Gigas the Tall and he had his men bring him the princess. General Tom Thumb gathered his army and attacked the palace of the Giants.
title: The Dwarf Kingdom of Lilliput Versus Gigas the Tall, Prince of the Giants
